creditline: Gift of the John C. Weber Collection
description: rectangular black lacquer tray decorated in gold and silver hiramaki-e, hirame and inlays of mother-of-pearl; interior with birds, butterflies, maple leaves, and flowering plants; the exterior sides with inlay mother-of-pearl and gilt carriage wheels in gilt waves, speckled ground, pewter rim; with a black wood tomobako storage box with lid and plum color tie; hand sewn wrapping cloth with orange silk on one side and tan floral print on the other side
inscription: paper label on side of box with Japanese inscription
markings: circular sticker on lid and side of box: 100 LEWIS COLLECTION
medium: Black lacquer with gold and silver hiramaki-e, hirame, and inlays of mother-of pearl with pewter rim
title: Sutra tray
